description: SEQUOIA showcases this stunning 4 bed, 3 bath home including a versatile rec room at the lower level in Sequoia by Fairborne is a must see. This rare unit features a WALK-OUT fenced private backyard off the kitchen with serene GREENSPACE views. Designed for entertaining, it boasts an open floor plan, massive kitchen with L-shaped island, and high-end S/S appliances. Bright and spacious with plenty of windows, it offers 3 bedrooms up and 2.5 bathrooms. Enjoy fantastic amenities including a party room, guest suite, and gym. Conveniently located near transit and within walking distance to both levels of school, including French Immersion Snokomish Elementary. Open House Jan 3rd and 4th - Sat - Sun - 2:30 - 4:30 PM
